meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Whittle down</kanji> and <kanji>decrease</kanji> something. This is a <vocabulary>reduction</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>cutback</vocabulary>, since you're whittling down and decreasing it.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
